About Me

BIO

I am Tuan Doan, 25 years old, born in Vietnam, studying in Finland.

My major is Information Technology. Although I experienced various competence tracks in the university, I favor front-end developing the most at this moment. I also like Java as a back-end programming language. My next target is to become a full-stack developer.

Moreover, I have strong education background in the field of Business Management. I started with getting a bachelor degree in Vietnam. In Finland, I joined various projects, events and courses related to business management and entrepreneurship.
